membership
Class MSControllerElection

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      membership.MSControllerMulticast
          membership.MSControllerElection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, MSController
public class MSControllerElection
extends MSControllerMulticast

This controller handles the election procedure. The election works as follows : - Send a membership message on the 2nd level ring - Sets a timeout on the socket and wait for a message * a message with inferior leader ID => member * a message with superior leader ID => leader * timeout expired (no receive) => leader

Version:
1.5
